snippet: Microsoft introduces Outlook.com, a free Web-based e-mail service that improves on the tainted image of Hotmail.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column observes that Microsoft introduces Outlook.com, a free Web-based e-mail service that improves on the tainted image of Hotmail; lauds the service as having lots of smarts.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft introduces Outlook.com, a free Web-based e-mail service that improves on the tainted image of Hotmail.

headline.seo: Outlook.com, an E-Mail Service With Lots of Smarts - State of the Art
headline.main: An E-Mail Service With Lots of Smarts
headline.print_headline: An E-Mail Service With Lots Of Smarts
